definition: to immerse oneself in (one's work, studies etc)
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: And as I shifted back and forth, engrossed in thought, I felt a bit self-conscious.
sentences.chinese: 我來回轉移，埋首于思考，但還有點自我意識。

sentences.english: He occupied himself writing a mystery story.
sentences.chinese: 他埋首於推理小說的寫作。

sentences.english: Angawadi workers are studying health and children education knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村託兒所的教師埋首學習衛生及兒童教育知識。

sentences.english: When I came to prison, I dove into Buddhism headfirst .
sentences.chinese: 當我來到監獄的時候，我不顧前後地埋首於佛學。

definition: to bend over one's desk (writing, studying, taking a nap etc)
to chant/to recite rhythmically/to polish verse
to wander/to shift around/to waver/to vacillate
to write at a tremendous speed
to move back and forward/to trade
lit. heads rubbing together (idiom)/fig. very close relationship
to curl up/to lie with knees drawn up/to huddle up
(coll.) to remove (crinkles, dirt) with the palm of the hand
